data.event: A FAILED asylum seeker was jailed for 11 months yesterday after using a fake passport to work as a carer.

event.title: was caught after a raid on her home last November

data.event: She was caught after a raid on her home last November.

event.title: arrived in the UK from Nairobi in 2002

data.event: Oxford Crown Court heard Munene arrived in the UK from Nairobi in 2002 but her asylum application was rejected two years later.
Oxford Crown Court heard Munene arrived in the UK from Nairobi in 2002 but her asylum application was rejected two years later.
